channel.title: Out of SRAM when compiling old Projects
channel.description: I just opened a few of my older Axoloti projects and one, which definitely worked back in 2017 although it was large, is now throwing an error on compiling, because the patch is using 300-some too many bytes of SRAM. Have there been some SRAM reductions since then? I don’t remember what software and firmware updates I did over the years.

item.title: Out of SRAM when compiling old Projects
item.dc:creator: @jaffasplaffa Mr. Grimm
item.description:
@jaffasplaffa wrote:

Last release was April 2018, which was 1.0.12-2.

Not sure if there was any changes made in that release that could affect SRAM usage.

Read full topic
item.source: Out of SRAM when compiling old Projects
